snippet: German media said the country’s domestic intelligence agency cooperated with American spy services in monitoring European partners and companies.
abstract: German news media reports that country's domestic intelligence agency BND cooperated with United States in monitoring European partners and companies.

byline.contributor: Nicola Clark contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: German media said the country’s domestic intelligence agency cooperated with American spy services in monitoring European partners and companies.

headline.main: Germany Is Accused of Helping N.S.A. Spy on European Allies
headline.print_headline: Germany Is Accused of Helping U.S. Spy on European Allies
